Detailed Description

Header file for memory management oriented functionality, as implemented in COmmon/MemoryManagement.c.

Copyright (2005) Â© Amdocs, All Rights Reserved

This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND either expresses or implied.

Id
MemoryManagement.h,v 1.10 2005/05/09 13:30:01 dmitryk Exp

The file contains definition for functions concerning:

  • Reference counted objects handling
  • Object destruction on deallocation

Note:
There is a dependency between this code and Platforms/Generic/GenericPlatform.c, in the layout of object headers.

Function Documentation

IPDR_Status Object_Allocate (  IPDR_PlatformServices *  PS,
size_t  Size,
void(*)(IPDR_PlatformServices *PS, void *)  Destructor,
void **  Object
) 
 

Allocate a reference counted object with the requested size.

Parameters:
PS handle to a platform services structure
Size size of object in bytes.
Destructor pointer to a function which will be called once the object's reference count reaches zero.
Object pointer to newly created object (output)
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.

IPDR_Status Object_Delete (  IPDR_PlatformServices *  PS,
void *  Object
) 
 

Delete a reference counted object (ignoring the current reference count)

Parameters:
PS handle to a platform services structure
Object object to delete
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.

IPDR_Status Object_Duplicate (  IPDR_PlatformServices *  PS,
void *  Object
) 
 

Increase the reference count of an object by one.

Parameters:
PS handle to a platform services structure
Object object to increase reference count of.
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.

int Object_GetReferenceCount (  IPDR_PlatformServices *  PS,
void *  Object
) 
 

Get the reference count of an object.

Parameters:
PS handle to a platform services structure
Object object to get reference count of
Returns:
Reference count of the object

IPDR_Status Object_Release (  IPDR_PlatformServices *  PS,
void *  Object
) 
 

Decrease the reference count of an object. If the reference count reaches zero the destructor will be called and the memory allocated for the object will be freed.

Parameters:
PS handle to a platform services structure
Object object to release
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.
